name: WINGMAN (jangomango2001)
description:
Inspired from Modern warfare's Gunfight mode.

Two teams, Each of 2 players, fight each other with randomly selected weapons with random attachments. There is no time limit, You must eliminate the other team to win. Team that wins 6 rounds, wins the whole match.

The game is multiplayer only (for now).

Requires 2 players to play and the match can fill up to 4 players.

You can play on L.A.N or Online (steam is required for online)
